channel.title: !help!
channel.description:
Do i need to have compile.bat and runserver.bat open and running at the same time so my friends can play my server? If i do.... how do i get them both to run at the same time? when i run them at the same time i get this error:
"ERROR: unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?" (no quotation marks) please help someone..i have like 15 ppl who want to check my server out, but they cant get in it. any ideas, programs(to help) and or sugestions. thanks :)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 18, 2006, 09:07:29 AM[/size][hr](\_/) (o.O) <<---- do it for the cute bunny (u u)

item.title: !help!
item.dc:creator: @monsha monsha
item.description:
@monsha wrote:

we tried, it didn’t work lol. maybe its saying “you are notto be having a RS PS” i realy don’t know lol. any ideas?well any other ideas? any at all i’ll be happy lol and can you try logging into mine? i’ll pm you the network name and pass.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 18, 2006, 12:45:40 PM[/size][hr]anyone else out there who can help? like what IP i need to give me friends or…? anything… please post.

Read full topic

item.title: !help!

item.description:
@Flying-Turtle-Assass wrote:

Right if you have hamachi, and your friends have got it, they can see your IP, use that one

item.description:
@monsha wrote:

ok. so how do i make it so other ppl can log into my server? give them an IP address? but what one?

item.title: !help!
item.dc:creator: @Flying-Turtle-Assass Flying-Turtle-Assassin
item.description:
@Flying-Turtle-Assass wrote:

No, you only have one of them started up so open compile.bat up first and when it has Finnished compiling close it, then open server.bat and have it running. Remmber as soon as it has stopped runnning your server will be closed until opened again

Read full topic
